title: Chat Room Bug
body:
(I'm assuming this is related to the app.)

While logged out of LoL on my PC, I'm showing up in chat rooms that I left 3+ days ago while I'm logged into the mobile app, though the app doesn't support chat rooms(that I've found).  I found this out after receiving several friend requests while on the app, and asking where they found my name.

replies.body: Oh, that sounds really weird! Let me ask someone about this, that should not be happening.
